descriptionHtml:
[font=century gothic][size=5]BASIC INFO[/size]
A Mesh Replacer that changes the Default Odahviing with an Armored Odahviing Model.

[right][size=5]RECOMMENDATIONS[/size]
Texture Replacer: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3104]Daedric Armor and Weapon Improvement[/url][/right]

[size=5]INSTALLATION[/size]
NMM or MO:
- download the main file
- simply install

MANUAL:
- download the main file
- extract files with winRAR
- copy file and paste it in your data folder
- overwrite if asked
- start the game and enjoy

[center][size=5]VIDEO PREVIEW[/size]
[youtube]KxAMXD9BVI0[/youtube][youtube]Kj-2f0hzOfk[/youtube][/center][/font]
author: Loshirai14
